Spacious living area with Kerala-style wooden flooring and traditional decor. Open plan design integrating views of the garden.
Adjacent to the kitchen, ensuring ease of serving meals while maintaining clear sight lines to the garden.
A modern yet traditional Kerala-style kitchen with dedicated ventilation and adherence to Vastu (south-east) positioning for energy flow.
Guest room designed with traditional Kerala elements, positioned in the south-west for positive energy. Includes a small balcony overlooking the garden.
